website_summaries.verdict: Made in the USA and 100% natural, this supplement uses the properties of green tea to improve memory and focus for less than other brands.
pros: Users like both the increase in overall memory and in energy, and report feeling more rested when waking in the morning
No caffeine as an ingredient, so no jitters as a side effect
Students are happy with improved focus during classes, studying, and test-taking
cons: Should take close to meals to prevent stomach upset
stay hydrated throughout the day, or supplement may cause headaches

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the free bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Neuro Health in July 2018 for $13.55 and it product included an offer for an additional, free, bottle in exchange for leaving a review. I can’t honestly say whether or not this product has improved my brain performance, but I’m hopeful. Thanks! Edit: In August of 2018, the vendor for this product contacted me and requested that I edit this review to exclude details of their free offer. The customer service representative, Emma, explained that my review could create unfavorable results for me personally as Amazon would likely flag me for "bias" and prevent me from reviewing products in the future. The vendor also reminded me that I can update my star rating positively.
customer_reviews.author: ClevGuy216

customer_reviews.title: Great neutropic. Definitely works well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. I've been taking it for over a year. It's always made a noticeable difference. I'm always more alert, and more able to think quickly and clearly even when I don't get enough sleep (which is often). About 2 weeks ago, I went a full week without them because I was in Florida. Immediately noticed a difference. I didn't feel nearly as sharp as usual. Got back home, resumed taking them daily and noticed the difference right away. If you want something that will allow you to be closer to your full potential, I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Stiglitz

customer_reviews.title: The effects are subtle but noticeable. My wife and ...
customer_reviews.text: The effects are subtle but noticeable. My wife and I both use this. We sometimes find ourselves searching for a word...the clinical term would be expressive aphasia I believe...we are both in our 50's and while this can be an expected part of aging, we find this product reduces the frequency of those moments and makes us feel more focused.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with the focus from having ADHD. Not ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with the focus from having ADHD. Not only was it significantly cheaper than FOCUS FACTOR- I really did not notice a difference of result between the two. On top of that I am given a second bottle free for writing a review on here? Winner, winner chicken dinner, yo.
customer_reviews.author: 1weirdo2cents

customer_reviews.title: Great for short term memory.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Neuro Health for a month now. I feel more alert and rested when waking, which is a big change. My short term memory is better because I can remember my appointments and other commitments without constantly referring to my calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Deb O

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t recommended this product to anyone. I’ve taken it for a week and have felt zero difference in my day to day life. My suggestion would be to find something that isn’t a proprietary blend so you know the doses are what you are getting. In my opinion, companies that hide behind proprietary blends are not in business to help the customer at all. You pay for a product you are owed to know exactly what you are paying for. I've also seen this exact ingredient label on other bottles which leads me to believe this stuff is sold in bulk and branded over and over. It didn't work for me but your mileage may vary. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: carlos santiago

customer_reviews.title: Not work
customer_reviews.text: Not work. Seller give free bottle if review 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Doan

customer_reviews.title: For a while I have experienced fatigue lack of concentration ...
customer_reviews.text: For a while I have experienced fatigue lack of concentration, not and remembering things... I felt the difference with the first capule..My energy increased immediately. .. and my thoughts are so much clear. Has any one experienced dark urine after taking these capules? If so please leave comment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for son
customer_reviews.text: My fifteen year old had been on Concerta. He wanted to try something different. So I bought this and he tried it for school. He says that it helps him and he likes it better than the prescription. Will keep buying for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Eisenhour

customer_reviews.title: scam
customer_reviews.text: awful and unbearable smell/taste. had no effect on focus or energy, the great reviews are because they claim to send a free bottle for 5 stars. don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Bye-Bye ADHD
customer_reviews.text: I’m 32 years of age with severe ADHD. I’ve tried many prescription and over the counter drugs my entire life, but nothing has worked; until now. I HIGHLY recommend this product! (And no, I am not writing this for the free bottle incentive😜) I’m already a subscriber!👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Francis Kim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing so far. Will update.
customer_reviews.text: Given the number of positive reviews I was excited and hopeful this product would deliver on target. Today is my second day of use since taking delivery, and I can say with all honesty I feel nothing but a slight headache which may or may not have anything to do with the product. As for someone like myself who never get headaches I think there may be a correlation. Perhaps I received a bad lot. I will continue the product a day or two longer and advise and update as I go.
customer_reviews.author: David Stock

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Stale product. Almost all the walls of the capsules have clearly visible mold. Since the product is for health, I do not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beejinmaa

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Promotes clear thinking and improved my memory after about two weeks for me. Make me feel better all over. You have to take two pills so 60 caps is only one month supply. I use it as a one a day vitamin pill.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice any difference on this supplement. I don’t know if it’s fair to provide a one-star review because maybe there were undetectable benefits, but if you are looking for something that will give a noticeable edge—this is probably not your solution.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Park

customer_reviews.title: no discernible effect, none
customer_reviews.text: worthless, in my opinion. I could detect no enhancement whatsoever, nor could my wife who I also gave to try. In conclusion, this product like most others makes claims that can't be and haven't been substantiated by blind study testing. In essence - bull💩- in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur H. Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Took supplement for a month and experienced no benefits
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this supplement to aid my short-term memory and focus. Sadly, I did not feel any noticeable changes to my memory or improved concentration after taking the recommended dose for almost a month. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Trish Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Take your chances
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking them less than 30 days now and have not noticed any difference. I have esophagus disease and the pills are not easy to swallow. Also I do not like the smell of them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Product
customer_reviews.text: Nogawise.com offers a free bottle for an "honest review" with the purchase of the first bottle. The first thing I noticed was that it had a calming effect on me. My mind seemed clearer and memory improved after a few days of taking it as directed. The only downside for me was the "fishy" smell and slightly fishy taste. But I think the benefit outweighs the very brief fishy experience so I'm pleased to get a second bottle. By the way, I am 81 years so I figure if it can help me it should be even more effective for those with younger brains. I can and do recommend this product by this lab.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfloner

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective AND causes extreme nausea!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this as suggested for 5 days. I will give it more time to see if it starts working. However, the reason I’m writing the review NOW is because they have made me extremely nauseated every time I’ve taken them! Within about 15 minutes of ingesting them, I feel like I’m going to throw up. It’s happened every day so far. And I’m sick for hours after taking them. So, not only are they completely ineffective (I haven’t noticed even a slight difference in memory improvement, mental clarity or recall ability), they are also causing nausea and “flu-like” symptoms for a few hours after taking them. Don’t risk it and try a different supplement.
customer_reviews.author: CR_RN1977

customer_reviews.title: Give it time to work for you.
customer_reviews.text: We are trying it for our short term memory. We are both in our middle 70’s and need to be reminded from time to time of things we should remember. My wife said she notices a little difference in memory. I have not noticed yet but willing to give it a chance to work. On our second bottle now.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Tworek

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! It helped me think clearly and gave me more energy! Update: had to downgrade to 4 stars. product is amazing, but don’t believe the company when they say they will give you a free bottle if you write a review. I have attempted three times to receive that bottle and they never deliver. Too bad- I will definitely continue using it though.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Pills that will help your mind be clear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this supplement because my wife is losing her mine and forgetting things constantly, she would believe that she didn’t say something when she did or she did when she didn’t. She always need energy and be stress free more often for her work and our child driving her crazy. Since she took the pill she have more energy, more focus, remembering things more, when we ran out of this she ask me to get more because she can feel the difference, so yes this pill works wonder.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Neuro Health
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent product. If you check all the vitamins contained in each pills you will realized that most of us neglet to add them to our diet. You can take with additional product but this one is completed and help feed our brain.
customer_reviews.author: Ars

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a focusing Vitamin that works!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several brands, Neuro Health has kept me focused on completing my task. I had my doubts at first. But within a week, it kicked in. You won't notice an immediate effect; it is not magic folks. You have to allow some time for the minerals to build up in your body. I hope they don't raise the price after this review that I have written. But I am hoping to help others like me that need to stay on task. I want everyone also to know that I am not getting paid for this write up. I only write about items that I know will work to help others.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: I noticed a difference after the third day
customer_reviews.text: I am a full time student as well as working full time. After the third day of taking Neuro Health I noticed that I was able to focus in my evening classes as well starting to retain the information while studying for an exam. After one week, I could notice a total different in memory and focus. This is a great product to get you the focus you need and your mind ready for whatever task you need to get accomplished. I will continue to take this product and I will write another review on an update after how I feel after this.
customer_reviews.author: KRHorn80

customer_reviews.title: Already making a difference!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I feel like this product has lifted my brain fog and I am sleeping better at night! Even though the pills are large, they are easy to swallow. I noticed a difference the first day of taking these supplements!. I was going to buy Focus Factor but I liked that these are vegan. I'm not a Vegan but I am trying to keep my diet as clean as possible. These don't upset my stomach and I have a very sensitive one so that's a huge plus.So far my short term memory seems better too. I will keep taking these and hope things will only improve more over time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Violet

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, reasonable results.
customer_reviews.text: As an older person, I tend to take these type products more to stave off problems rather than correcting them. This product seems fine and seems to help keep my thinking fresh and alert. I am looking for more long-term benefits than short-term, so I'll report on that at a later date. Good product, good value. Follow up after 90 days. Not a hugely exciting difference but noticeable. Being realistic here. I usually take a couple capsules thirty minutes before I go to work on business email and solving problems. It's like a little extra help Well worth the reasonable cost. I'm pretty good at placebo effect :-) but think this is more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Tzark

customer_reviews.title: Helps with clarity and retain information
customer_reviews.text: Neuro Health works!!!!! I was taking it faithfully when studying for the board exam. I struggled to pass the board exam, then I started to take this capsule, I kid you not, my mind started to become clear and retain the information I was studying gradually. This stuff keeps you focus. You do not need coffee or any other energy drinks to keep you wired up, this stuff does very well on its own, in addition, you do not crash at all. I will continue to take this product because I start my new job soon:) and want to retain all the information that I will learn during my orientation period. Thanks Neuro Health!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BKSP

customer_reviews.title: Great product for focus and attention throughout the day!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! On my second bottle now! I take it every morning before I even get out of bed. It was a game changer for me at work. I need to be a multi-tasker at all times and Neuro Health brain formula helps a bunch! I do find that I need to eat shortly after taking it though. But that may be just me. This product is excellent for anyone that needs more focus!
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried this supplement because I felt like I was very forgetful sometimes and that I had trouble concentrating at work and on my writing. Since taking this supplement my memory seems to have improved and I am able to better focus at work. My desire to write hasn't increased that much, but I think that's due to other factors like writer's block, etc. and perhaps more than a single supplement can help with. Overall I feel like this is helping me and will continue buying on a monthly basis.
customer_reviews.author: bookfan878

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be perfectly honest with you — I had low expectations with this stuff. Sure, it had lots of promises, but could it live up to the hype? Surprisingly... yes. Now, it's not exactly a super pill that does wonders, but here's what I DID take notice of. After a week's usage I didn't have the typical "brain fog" I've grown accustomed to. I felt more a bit more alert, more aware of what was going on around me, conversations and sounds and... yeah... just more conscious of my surroundings. But the best part? No jitters. No overload of energy or crankiness or anything like that. It was all good, and no drawbacks. I'll definitely be using this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mills

customer_reviews.title: It makes me poop a lot
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel the energy. I don't see any improvements on my concentration. Some reason I poop after 10-15 minutes. Don't bother with this, just stick to healthy lifestyle choices. No medicine will fix your laziness.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: This is a good replacement for ADHD medicine
customer_reviews.text: I took adderall XR 35mg for 7 years but I was grinding my teeth a lot and along with being a little too focused on work instead of family, I decided to stop taking it. I’ve been off of it for almost two years but my job was suffering from my lack of concentration. The Neuro Health is not an exact replacement for adderall, but it is good enough for me. I just needed a little edge and this helps out a lot. Stuff still works great
customer_reviews.author: Person who reads books

customer_reviews.title: TURBO CHARGE MEMORY
customer_reviews.text: This product turbocharged my memory with ease! It definitely improved my cognitive faculties. I'm a little bit surprised, considering the low price of this supplement and the equally effective results.
customer_reviews.author: Olugbenga Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing for me other than INCREASE my anxiety. I feel as if I had drank 10 redbulls after I take one of these pills. Felt very anxious. I have taken the entire bottle since I bought it because I thought I would get used to them. But no, they still make me feel extremely anxious. If you are a very anxious person, I'd stay away from these.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone looking to improve their cognitive function ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it before my morning workouts and mid-day when the daytime fatigue usually hits, and I felt a noticeable difference in my mental clarity and focus! Definitely gives me that extra push I need to get through my day, with no jitters or caffeine buzz. I would recommend this to anyone looking to improve their cognitive function and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Teryn Merc

customer_reviews.title: It deserves being top 3!
customer_reviews.text: I have twin boys who are Autistic. I was tired of the prescription meds which seemed to have more side effects than benefits. After doing months of research and looking for a more naturopathic approach was happy to find this product online. Its rated in the top 3 best brain supplements and its affordable!. I am going to purchase a few more. I am seeing small improvements which I believe with continuously taking it bigger and better will come. Will write a follow up update after they've taken it for a full 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my "Lack of Focus & Brain Fog"
customer_reviews.text: I recently decided to try something due to my "lack of focus" and "brain fog" I was experiencing while studying for an exam. When I found Neuro Health, I thought why not give it a try...I haven't tried anything else before in the past. I began to take the capsules when it arrived and it took almost a week before I noticed any difference...but I did! I work on a computer most of my day and I notice subtle changes. Now I take it daily to continue to have that mental clarity and focus, like I use to in years past!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lavid

customer_reviews.title: It works for my brain chemistry needs-thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I signed up for the 90 subscription refill and I plan on taking them more regularly. I found that I have more focus, retention of short-term memory, and increased productivity. I've also found that it has a calming effect. Many of the other brain and focus formulas brands have caused an increase in anxiety and nervousness most likely caused by over-use of green tea or caffeine in the ingredients, but not this product. I really like this and I recommend this for anyone that wants greater focus and memory retention.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Mood Swings
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptical about brain supplements because ive tried several in my time and only semi liked one of them... until this one. I suffer from PMDD thus get massive emotional mood swings every 2 to 3 weeks... ive been taking these consecutively and this was the first month in years that I did not suffer from my usual horrible mood changes. Shocked by this, i gave a supply to my mother who suffers from frequent bouts of anxiety and depression and she, too, has noticed a difference in her behavior. I'm going to continue taking these and see if I still feel this stable a month from now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SB Roozenboom, Author

customer_reviews.title: Not sure, hard to tell for sure if I can credit any improvements to cognition from neurohealth
customer_reviews.text: Not sure.. it's hard to tell if it's that effective. Some double blind studies would always be nice to see to give more confidence in the product. I feel like I remember noticing a difference a while ago. Avoiding mindless internet surfing and social media dopamine kicks seems like the most effective way to increase attention span, cognition and mood in this day in age.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: this is the best, it keeps your mind focus and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Neuro Health works very well, for those who are always working and have lots on there plate, this is the best, it keeps your mind focus and sharp. You feel more on point and recall information quicker. Also for someone like me who is a gym nut, it is great because your mental focus on the gym is sharp and with that focus, you put in a better work out. A great product, all around.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Archie

customer_reviews.title: Really helped me
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried. I am 58-My memory started declining and I was having trouble staying focused at work. Things that normally came easy were hard to remember. I contacted my doctor and she ran some tests. My B-12 was really low so I started on a slow dissolve B-12 and started the Neuro Health capsules. This product seems to be working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: honest reviews not allowed so my 1 star says all you need to know. save your money
customer_reviews.author: Virgil L Furlow

customer_reviews.title: Honest product that delivers results
customer_reviews.text: After taking the product regularly for a couple of days I feel like I have natural energy and sharper mental clarity. I've gotten less dependent on caffeine, and feel much more active and productive especially during my workdays throughout the day. Highly recommend this product to anyone who strives for greater focus, energy and productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Park

customer_reviews.title: A Hightened Mind!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 78 yr old man with memory issues. Since using this product, I’m amazed how names, places and memories seemed to pop up without effort or being reminded by my siblings or children. I will keep using!!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Improved Memory and clearer thinking
customer_reviews.text: Neuro Health has helped me improve my memory and has giving me a clearer thinking. I have a new job and have a lot to learn and this product is the perfect tool for helping me retain new information. In addition, I find it helps me understand things better with clearer thinking. I would recommend this product to anyone that is looking for better memory.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Will be rebuying!
customer_reviews.text: Felt a difference after a week. Amazing! Getting started on a project or assignment as a student- heck, even doing dishes after a meal- is still taking for me but once started I see it through. It's a very natural motivation. With other changes in my life as well, my demeanor and mood has overall improved. Likely do to actually being able to focus and feel accomplished in small feats. I recommend it for those like me who have a hard time doing things they don't wanna do or get distracted easily by things they *actually* wanna do lol
customer_reviews.author: NY4LYFE

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel any difference at all
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to improve my memory and thinking speed. I do a lot of multitask and I didnt feel any difference nor improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Getting ready for my important exam!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that will help me with my exam preparation. When I brought this product, I didn't expect that it would really work. I just need something that help me psychologically. Well... I would say that I can actually feel the different. I don't sleep much lately so it is hard for me to focus and stay alert all day. I still feel tried. But the pills help me push myself to go through my days and be able to focus on my reading. 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: gaminuniverse

customer_reviews.title: Used a few nootropics can't beat the price and effect!
customer_reviews.text: So writing a honest review I have always been hesitant because regardless of a free product if something is not great I usually would not waste the energy in making up a review. However, Neuro Health is definitely effective and works! I tried other products on amazon and private companies but for the price and supply I will be sticking to this for the foreseeable future. I would definitely recomend giving this product a shot. An example is I worked a 16 hour shift with 5 hrs of sleep or less took this and I felt a more positive mood and focus on tasks. Trust me try it!
customer_reviews.author: erick hassan

customer_reviews.title: No effect.
customer_reviews.text: I saw no difference in taking this product in an attempt to help with focus and studying. Took the product for a full month as prescribed. Made no impact in my life. Did some research and the information on this product is sketchy. Would not waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t waste my money again
customer_reviews.text: I am so annoyed that these people actually believed this was worth the price for one bottle. The picture makes it look like you’re getting three when in fact it’s one bottle with only 15 servings.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This product gave side effects of feeling emotional and depressed, which stopped after stopping the product. It’s apparently too late to return, but there is no one to talk to about the product! The number on the bottle always goes to a recording that takes your name and number but never ever a call back as promised in the recording....even after multiple days of trying.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old takes these in the morning for school. She claims they do help, and I really hope they do. All I ask for is to have her be able to focus and concentrate more. She doesn't like the taste of them and they're a little hard for her to swallow, but they're not that bad. She's only been taking them for a few weeks so I can only hope for more positive results. I really don't like ADD medication and don't want to result back to that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works. Its kind of like a herbal adderall. Of course it’s not near as strong as adderall but I can definitely feel this stuff. I always take on an empty stomach. I bought another brand of this at Costco, the Costco one has the same exact mg of proprietary blend ( little different ingredients ). The Costco one you have to take 4 huge pills that are rough and get stuck going down your throat. Neuro Health is two easy to swallow caps and I fell more of an effect with them. I highly recommend trying this, I’m sure it will work for most people.
customer_reviews.author: G3

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: I and been taking this since they arrived. I have noticed absolutely no difference. Waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: smurfmonkey

customer_reviews.title: They do what vitamins are meant to do...
customer_reviews.text: Its weird writing a review explaining how vitamins made me feel better, but yet...here I am. I have a neurological disorder so I take b vitamins to help as my condition needs them to function normally. Anywho...I figured why not give a product called neurohealth a try. They def give more clarity and focus...but as I eluded to in the beginning...they're vitamins so its their job. I will say if you're not lacking vitamins then u prob won't notice anything right? *I was offered a free bottle for my review...still it was honest
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My take
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this product for about 5 days and I am really beginning to notice some good effects. Unlike some other products I’ve taken, this product feels less like a caffeine/sugar rush and more like my own mind using its natural chemicals to rejuvenate itself. My apologies if this is an abstract explanation, but it really does feel like this product boosts and supports whatever occurs in my brain naturally to provide me with much needed mental energy and focus. I will continue to take the product and will update (and may rate higher) after I get an idea of how this product effects me over several weeks span.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bryson

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: MIGHT WORK FOR SOMEONE ELSE, BUT GAVE ME A LOW LEVEL HEADACHE EVERY TIME I TOOK IT, AND ACTUALLY SEEMED TO MAKE MOE MORE FORGETFUL (I WOULD MAKE MORE MISTAKES AT MY JOB WHEN USING). WOULD NOT BUY THIS AGAIN, BECAUSE I DID NOT LIKE IT, BUT DIFFERENT THINGS WORK FOR DIFFERENT PEOPLE
customer_reviews.author: Mower_Home

customer_reviews.title: because my poor memory is horrible at times
customer_reviews.text: I must start of stating I never do reviews or order supplements, but these supplements are working for me. I work full-time, in college full-time, and a full-time grandmother/mom. I really notice the difference in my concentration after taking these supplement for 2 days. I have more energy and is more motivated and focused to get simple task completed, especially homework assignment. I not sure with the memory as of yet, that review will be a come back, because my poor memory is horrible at times. I am going to highly recommend, I haven't had any side effects as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Real Lovely Lady

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: After taking them for about a month I can say they did not do a thing for me. I think I'm more forgetful now than anything!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Clearer memory access
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product as my information recall has been suffering for some years now. I mean, it was nothing to affect my lifestyle or anything; it was just frustrating not to be able to recall, what should be readily available, information at will. I started taking Neuro Health just to try it and within a few days, names and such that I had been struggling to recall for months immediately popped into my head as if they were just hiding in the mist. My dreams also became more vivid and the content slightly less disturbing. Good find; good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and super affordable
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this item, I did hours and hours of research of the top brands. I was looking for ingredients, quality, price and reviews. This particular one stood out in a bunch of the reviews I saw. Come to find out, it was also super affordable too! I've been taking it for one week and I can honestly say that I feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: saleh M.

customer_reviews.title: An HONEST review
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Am on my second month taking it and it still surprises me how much I get done. I have adult ADHD which I’ve always managed naturally. This is my favorite product, second only to my probiotic, for ADHD. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mental Focus With Two Tablets a Day
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have researched which supplements work best for me for focus, but got tired of taking so many tablets to do the task. I came across this product with covers the supplements I have been taking and some but without Gingko which I am sensitive to. I'm focused and motivated taking only two tablets a day. No allergies for me and seems to be a winner. Not to mention that the price is right as well.
customer_reviews.author: J E Masters

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product does absolutely nothing for me!! I feel no affect at all when taken. Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective!
customer_reviews.text: I was uber skeptical about this product’s claims. But I was amazed at how quickly I noticed an improvement in my memory. I don’t use that word “amazed” lightly. I’m what you’d call “elderly” and at that age it was just a fact of life. I noticed an improvement the first day. I was just going about my daily routine and recalled something from previous day. And it was so palpable I stopped in my tracks and made mention of it (to myself). It probably seems insignificant to most but to me I was elated. I’m not saying it’s a miracle drug but it satisfies me if my memory improves a little step at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Em

customer_reviews.title: Please read before you buy
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me at all. I felt like it caused me to be less focused and it was absolutely did not help my memory! If you are looking for a good, reliable brain supplement go with focus factor.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: After taking this product for 2 months, I found absolutely no changes in focus, memory, or any of its other claims. If the idea was to take it forever before you notice any changes...I’m not the guy to waste my time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Holland

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a long time for a supplement I could take that was focused on brain health but everything had been expensive. When I saw this product, especially at it's price point I figured I might as well give it a shot. I take it with water first thing in the morning and can feel it working quickly. I feel as though it wakes up my brain even faster than coffee. It is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Noticible Difference
customer_reviews.text: I'm 61 I've been using Neuro Health for 4 weeks and while it is not a miracle pill, I definitely notice that words and names are more immediately available. I used to have much quicker recall and that has declined over time. Now with Neuro Health, I'm not searching for words nearly as much, they are just there when I need them. So, it is doing exactly what I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: Stay focused,alert ,no mid day crash and never any jitters.
customer_reviews.text: After struggling to keep up with demand of a new job,wifely duties and attempting to be a super mom. I decided to look for help... A natural supplement to help me focus, stay alert and avoid the mid day crash. I looked on Amazon and found what has been a lifesaver for me. I only need to take 1 capsule daily around 8am. I am able to focus and remain energized until I am ready to get to bed around 9pm. I'm so grateful for this supplement and will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Nalini Madison

customer_reviews.title: OK supplement, questionable company
customer_reviews.text: Mild effects but still noticeable. I would give it more stars if I could find anything about this company online. The website on the bottle does not exist. Therefore, I don't trust this company, which makes me not trust whats in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smiths

customer_reviews.title: An Awakening...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help give me focus and clarity for a huge project I'm working on. I must say that I felt the difference after only a few days when my recall got quicker. In past days I would struggle to recall the name of my favorite actors or Tv show. However, since I've taken Neuro Health I feel sharper and more focused than ever. Sometimes I'm so focused, I won't even check my text messages when I get into a good rhythm. I would certainly recommend this product to anyone. My only drawback is the size of the capsules, I have a tough time trying to swallow them sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: MsDee

customer_reviews.title: It Works as Needed for Memory and Focus
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for one month when I needed to stay up an get a few school assignments completed. In addition to assignments I also was required to memorize a few things, being a little tired from always being active ie. Work, Family, Fitness repeat I needed all the help I can get. I believe this product helped boost my memory a little more than if I would not have tried it. I recommend this product as the price point and quality was above average.
customer_reviews.author: ppierson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth taking
customer_reviews.text: At age 60, I stopped taking ADD medications and switched to supplements. I try one new supplement for 30 days and note any changes. I didn't know what to expect from NeuroHealth but gave it a try because it appeared to also take the place of a daily multivitamin. After two-three weeks, there was a notable change with improved clarity and I noticed I was working longer into the afternoon than usual (I'm a writer). NeuroHealth was the only change I made to my supplements and diet, and my sleep was the same 7-8 hours each night. I can only credit NeuroHealth for the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P Novak

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect this to work
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really expect this to work. I took the recommended dosage then promptly forgot about it. About an hour later there was definitely an effect. My thoughts were clearer and focus had definitely improved. Just finished the first bottle and the effect has continued. This is definitely a supplement I can recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Vel

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how well this works
customer_reviews.text: I waited about 1 1/2 weeks before giving my review to comment on this product. I really liked it and surprised by the results. I have trouble sleeping and waking up and next I take 2 before eating and within couple hours I am feeling better.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 38 and I have exactly 20 days taking this mind enhancing supplement. I read some reviews, compared the ingredients with others brain enhancing supplements and I got to the conclusion this is the best price with the same exactly ingredients compared with the other supplements $30.00 more expensive. I started looking for a brain enhancement because during the afternoon I would feel really mentally tired and without patience, I think this has help me a lot. I feel more alert. I will keep using it to see what other benefits will provide me.
customer_reviews.author: £ri&i&on

customer_reviews.title: This Worked Like Gangbusters For Me
customer_reviews.text: I had tried to some other brain supplements but found I had to add additional focus supplements for them to work. Well, I bought Neuro Health in February and I didn't have time to take a handful of pills, so I just took two of that supplement and found it filled the bill just fine. It also helped my mood as well as my focus and memory. I was so happy with the results I re-ordered in April. I realize everyone's chemistry works differently, but I recommend that everyone give this product at try. You might be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: RubyJuly

customer_reviews.title: Just added this to my regular regimen
customer_reviews.text: As a traumatic brain injury survivor, I face much greater challenges now than I once did. A proper diet and a beneficial supplement stack can make all the difference in helping to find a good balance and improve my performance. This supplement offers a good selection of beneficial nootropics at a reasonable price. I'm under 30 days in, and I'm not doing any controlled testing procedures, so I can't cite specific benefits at this point, but with the ingredients in this supplement, I'm optimistic it will be a contributor to better cognitive performance.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Rod, that's all.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product ive been taking this since I got it and it’s not giving me any energy I feel more tired than usual and by the end of the day I just want to crash it horrible. I got it because of the positive reviews. Don’t bother
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from CFS and Fibromyalgia, the constant fatigue and brain fog really get to me. I've tried multiple supplements and herbal treatments which some work and I have to rotate them around but this one seems to be working the best so far. It has a large combination of ingredients and combined they seem to be lifting the brain fog and I've been getting some of my energy back. I'm not fully back to normal but any improvement is something, and it's great just having that. I highly recommend you give this a try if you have CFS and or Fibromyalgia, I sure seems to help alleviate the problems for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chili_Red

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now been using this product for a few months and have noticed that my concentration has improved. I was having difficulty focusing at work and school. I was having trouble remembering small things at work. And now, I am able to focus and retain information better, which is especially great for someone whose in college like me. Getting things done efficiently has gotten easier for me. Needless to say, I will continue to use this product. I’m satisfied with the results I’m seeing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Neuro Health is the best Nootropic Blend you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Neuro health's proprietary blend of nootropics and vitamins promote better cognitive functioning . People are searching for a pill like the movie limitless , that product is fictional. Neuro Health's blends of ingredients promotes good brain health supplementing your brain and body with the necessary vitamins to make your brain preform at its highest level. I have taking almost every product from alpha brain to neuro clarity and by far neuro health's formula works the best for me. No headaches no groggy brain no cloudiness. I recommend taking this product with plenty of water and a healthy diet and exercise to get the most out of this product.

Like that this product ships quick normal sized pill bottle but filled to the very top with standard seal no cotton however. But for this price you're getting a lot for your money will probably stay with this product has it is good for almost 3 months for about 23-24 bucks not too bad at all.

customer_reviews.text: Great product, I would recommend to anyone who is looking for a boost. I have replaced my 3 cups of coffee a day with two of these capsules and I haven't noticed any decrease in energy or focus. These have become my go to for a second-wind of focus after a busy morning of focusing and making decisions. Well worth the money, well worth the experience.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using NEURO HEALTH for a couple of months and my husband and I both agree this is working. We use it for memory, health and thinking. Would recommend this product!!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student and I am in CS major so it is normal for me to look at the computer screen for hours . Hence, I get very tired around noon due to look at computer screen so much. However, I can see the different after using this product. I am able to focus more and stay awake, and I don't get so tired anymore. I would recommend this product to anyone that need an extra boost for the day. The price is decent enough as well. For me one pill a day is more than enough, and I take it early in the morning before class and work so it won't keep me awake at night.

customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Neuro health supplement from last 45 days and I found it very effective. It improved my memory and concentration. It also has other vitamins and nutrients that are required for normal growth and day to day activities. I am planning to take this supplement for at least 6 more months and see the long term effects. I definitely recommend this supplement for increased memory and brain function.
customer_reviews.author: Pandey Jee

customer_reviews.title: I Believe it Works
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product everyday for almost a month and I do believe it makes a difference when it comes to memory and alertness. I am a phone operator but it's highly cognitive work. I have noticed that at moments I do seem to have spurts of alertness and attentiveness which I didn't seem to notice before. I'm doing a combination of fasting and biotin so that could also contribute to what I'm going through. Either way, I haven't had any bad experiences with this product nor any negative side effects and I'd likely buy it again. I think once you begin taking it, it just becomes a part of your system...just like with anything.

customer_reviews.title: Senior Citizens Will Stay Alert
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for almost a month, I find that my Short Term Memory has improved and I feel far more alert all day long. I was skeptical when I first read the reviews of this product, but am now a true believer and will continue to use this product. I'm "All In" as they say. Update 9/29/20. For some reason I forgot to use this product for 7-10 days and every day around 6 PM I felt tired and drained. Today I started taking Neuro Health again and I felt that I had more energy today and was more mentally acute. I believe in this product and will continue to use it daily

customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for a few days now and it works great. I notice I am more switched on and I am able to think more clearly through problems. I have also noticed being more focused during my workouts as well. This is defiantly worth a shot if you are feeling a bit sluggish at times with your thought process.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: The capsule is easy to take, no after taste either. I've found that it has helped with my daily routines in that I'm more focused and my memory seems better. I would definitely recommend this product and will continue taking it.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn

customer_reviews.title: A real surprise!
customer_reviews.text: For years I doubted the efficacy of "vitamin supplements" that claimed marvelous improvement in any cognitive ability. After all, vitamin supplements had been used for time immemorial. But after I had felt I needed some sort of memory boost I decided to give this product a try. After two weeks I felt that I had improved my memory and my ability to remember the "right" word word the particular situation and silly enough who that actor in that movie and from a sceptic to an advocate for NEURO HEALTH before I finished my first bottle.

customer_reviews.text: I have hard time of studying for my exams and I am taking this neuro support for my NS. I could say that this stuff has vitamins and plants and it looks like it gives me more calm mood, less worries and better concentration. When I have only 5 days till my next exam I take two capsules, when I have my usual schedule I take only one capsule because I have vitamins in my another support supplement for vision and don't want to be overload with vitamins. I have Neuro Health on my Subscribe and save auto delivery for two months already.

customer_reviews.title: Noticed some difference
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this product for about a week. Overall this product was good. I did notice some increase in ability to focus and concentrate. Whether or not this is a placebo effect or result of the supplement is obviously impossible to know. Unsure about increased memory at this point. Have not noticed any undesirable side effects. Will continue to use for time being.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Nootropics Brain Supplement support - Memory Booster for Mind Focus Reduce Anxiety - DMAE Pills for concentration improve Brain function, Nuero & IQ with Bacopa Monnieri L-Glutamine for Men and Women
product_meta.description: Size:60 Count (Pack of 1)The best of the old world combined with the science of the new. Natures Craft offers a Focus, Memory and Clarity supplement that delivers a targeted and specifically stacked combination of nootropics, or “brain enhancers.” Specially chosen extracts, herbs and substances work together to boost attention, creativity, flexibility, focus, speed, memory and clarity. Green Tea Extract: Traditional supplement for mental performance. Promotes better brain function naturally. Huperzine A: Boosts alertness and enhances memory; extracted from Fir moss. Bacopa Monniera: Contains Bacosides which improve cognitive function and memory. L-Glutamine: An essential amino acid that builds protein and aids memory. Natures Craft pays special attention to the “stacking” benefits of all of these natural nootropic brain boosters, and hopes that you will experience the max benefits from your daily recommended dose. Packaging may vary.

ENHANCE MENTAL CLARITY – also called smart pills – capsules contain potent ingredients like Gaba – may improve blood pressure + cerebral blood flow – this clears away fog + is neuroprotective
